title: Spore NEXT
updateConfirm: The launcher will close to install the update. Do you want to continue?
disclaimerText: SPORE NEXT is developed and maintained by Franz. For support or inquiries, please reach out via Discord. The source code is available on GitHub and distributed under the MIT License. All mods are maintained by their respective authors. While most have been reviewed for quality and safety, users should exercise caution when installing unfamiliar mods. SPORE NEXT is not affiliated with, sponsored, or endorsed by Electronic Arts or Maxis. This launcher and all included or referenced mods are unofficial and not supported by EA or Maxis.
mod4gbpatchDescription: Applies a patch that allows the game to utilize more system memory — increasing the limit from the traditional 2GB to 4GB. This can help reduce crashes and improve stability when the game reaches standard Windows memory limits.
mod60fpsDescription: Removes the native FPS cap, allowing stable 60 FPS gameplay. It will also remove the EA/Maxis intro at the start of the game.
modHDDescription: Replaces textures, models, meshes, empire backgrounds and creator parts with high-resolution assets and enhances textures for distant objects, lighting, shadows and reflections.
modHDAuthor: franz, Mrs. White, Insane grox, Nutyo
modOnlineDescription: Allows the modded game to connect to the Spore servers again.
modCrashDescription: Fixes crashes that occur in several specific scenarios, such as when dying in creature stage. It does not fix all of them, but is highly recommended to fix some of the most common in the game.
installError: An error occurred during installation. The Spore or Galactic Adventures path might be incorrect.
sporeLaunchError: Failed to launch Spore. Please verify the path in settings.
gaLaunchError: Failed to launch Galactic Adventures. Please verify the path in settings.
uninstallAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to uninstall the Spore NEXT Mod Pack?
uninstallAllSuccess: All mods have been successfully uninstalled.
uninstallAllError: An error occurred while uninstalling the mods.
modAlreadyInstalledConfirm: The mod pack is already installed for this game and this location. Do you want to reinstall it?
closeWhileInstalling:
There's an Installation in progress. If you close the launcher now, the installation may be incomplete or corrupted. 

Are you sure you want to close?
uninstallAllNone: There were no mods installed to uninstall.
